## About this app

 _arrow_forward_

 **Unleash the power of AI to transform your dreams into reality with
achievable habits and tasks.**  
  
 **▌WHY USE DREAMFORA?**  
  
 **1\. AI-Powered Dream Planner: The Future of Goal Setting!**  
• Effortlessly set goals and turn dreams into actionable steps with AI, as our
system instantly creates personalized pathways to your objectives.  
• Discover and follow your passions with AI-generated plans, and access
expert-curated achievement strategies, offering vital guidance, tips, and
resources for smarter, more intelligent planning.  
  
 **2\. Enhance Your Journey with Productivity and Joy**  
• Stay organized and on track with daily reminders and an effortless, user-
friendly progress-tracking system.  
• Enjoy a visually appealing interface for a delightful personal growth
journey with Dreamfora – your path to success has never looked better!  
  
 **3\. Join a Thriving Community of Over 1.7 Million Dreamfora Users**  
• Engage with a community that shares, inspires, and grows collectively.  
• Exchange plans, progress, and insights within a supportive network.  
  
 **4\. Discover Daily Motivation and Inspiration to Fuel Your Journey**  
• Explore over 1,000 curated quotes for daily inspiration.  
• Keep on track with daily routines, easily managing habits and tasks to
achieve your dreams.  
  
 **Leap into a smarter, AI-enhanced way of achieving dreams with Dreamfora.**  
Download Dreamfora today for smarter planning and start your AI-powered
journey to success.  
Chase your dreams with Dreamfora!

Alexia Diaz

 _more_vert_

  * Flag inappropriate

November 29, 2023

I love it so much that I purchased the full version. The only reason this
isn't a 5-star is because of a bug in the rearrange feature. When you go to
rearrange it reverts to the original order. It would also be helpful for
habits to appear in the specified chronological order. Additionally, the
habits when listed out on the Android widget (Samsung Galaxy S21+) are not in
chronological order and it would be helpful if they were.

79 people found this review helpful

Did you find this helpful?

Yes

No

Dreamfora

November 30, 2023

We are truly sorry for any inconvenience caused to you. We understand that
while you can rearrange dreams in the Dreamfolder, not being able to rearrange
Habits and Tasks has been a hassle. Thank you for sharing your feedback with
us. We appreciate it and will work on incorporating this into our product
improvements in the near future!

J T

 _more_vert_

  * Flag inappropriate
  * Show review history

December 17, 2023

Unusable - Cannot 'create dreams of any kind'. I was excited to try this app
after reading all the glowing reviews and upon downloading, found that
irrespective of entering customised or preset suggestions for 'dreams',
Dreamfora throws the same error: 'Please try it again. An error occurred while
creating your dream'. Restarting the app does not help. In fact, sometimes it
just freezes on splash page. Very disappointing.

70 people found this review helpful

Did you find this helpful?

Yes

No

Dreamfora

December 17, 2023

Hi J T, we're sorry for the trouble. We tested the app; it works fine and
others with your device report no issues. Possible causes: storage, data
permissions, network, or install errors. Please try reinstalling. If issues
persist, email us at support@dreamfora.com with some screenshots of which you
met the problems. With love🧡 \- Team Dreamfora

Kayla Clancy

 _more_vert_

  * Flag inappropriate

July 11, 2020

Good customizability. Two stars for the fact that I have to check off my daily
tasks several times before it actually keeps them checked off. Note: the app
only saves after a certain amount of seconds, so if you made changes and close
it before then you get to repeat yourself. Results in days streak being reset
because if you check things off before bed and close it, it doesn't save. Have
had to go back and recheck several days worth of tasks. Recommendation to the
developer: decrease save time.

23 people found this review helpful

Did you find this helpful?

Yes

No

Dreamfora

July 13, 2020

Hi Kayla, We're sorry for the inconvenience! We are also aware of our data-
sync issue and are working towards a solution by developing an offline mode
for our users. Our team will try to make it available as soon as possible.
Thank you for your patience and understanding :) With love💕, - Team dreamfora

## What's new

Major Feature Update: Introducing Dream Curation and More!  
\- Easily view and add the Editor's recommended dreams from the 'Add' menu!  
\- Explore our regularly updated selections of Dreams and keep pursuing your
aspirations!  
\- Enhanced display showing how often users have added pre-made dreams  
  
Bug Fixes  
\- Fixed a sync error with Dreams after reinstallation and log in  
\- Enhanced stability and resolved minor issues
